title: hey riot
body: so its my bday at 8th of november, my friend decided to buy me a gift on LoL but we are on euw so rp is almost 3 time more expensive here ( we play on euw because every single guy in tr is toxic and we wanted to play the game without that much rage in it) he was going to buy me super galaxy rumble but it was way too expensive for the rp price so he bought me a random 975 skin gift and i got lord mordekaiser in it, is there any chance that i can refund that mordekaiser and buy a skin that at the same price? would make my day. ty for reading.

replies.body: I'm guessing Mordekaiser is not a champion you played regularly, and he wont' take it personally for not wanting his skin.  That randomness is the nature of receiving a mystery gift though, and isn't something that can be refunded per the[ refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If your account hasn't hit the daily limit for receiving gifts, your friend could give you a more specific one if that's possible.  Despite all that, I hope you have a happy birthday!
thanks for responding! its fine that i can't get a refund, i just wanted to know if i could have gotten something a little better but its ok, good luck on your games!
